Summary: Silver, 4 circular lobes, connected by a cross looking frame aprox size 18 wheel tractor trailer,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Montpelier
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi walked outside to have a smoke on my front porch and noticed it there hovering, at first i thought it was a constellation of loose aluminized balloons, after a short bit of time i realized it was not, it was approx 50'of the ground 1\4 mile to northeast of my position, i ran into the house to get my camera, took a minute or so to find it and turn it on memory was full except one pic left i took the picture, and while i was deleting some other pictures to make room, it zipped an an extremely high rate of acceleration to the north, it was out of sight in about 2 or 3 seconds.
